itunes:title: Ephesians Week 2 with Rebecca Faires
title: Ephesians Week 2 with Rebecca Faires
description:
In this second week of our Ephesians series, Raechel and Amanda talk with friend, sister, and She Reads Truth writer, Rebecca Faires. Together they talk honestly about the power of confession, the beauty of God’s covenant family, and the unified calling of the Church. They reminisce about the early days of She Reads Truth, laugh about duck parades, and encourage the Shes and each other to double down on their commitment to knowing their Bibles in order to know what is true. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Ephesians reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Ephesians Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 15% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15.

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/ephesians-week-2-with-rebecca-faires/
